tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT NOT NULL,
  email TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  height DECIMAL,
  weight DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR UNIQUE,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE YogaProgress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES UserProfiles(id),
    session_date DATE,
    duration INT,
    calories_burned FLOAT,
    poses_completed INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE progress_tracker (
    tracker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    progress_percentage INT,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE favorite_poses_sequences (
    favorite_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    pose_name VARCHAR(50),
    sequence_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE progress_tracker (
    tracker_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    progress_percentage FLOAT,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE favorite_poses (
    favorite_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    pose_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    difficulty_level INT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    experience_level VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE progress_tracking (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    pose_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    progress_percentage DECIMAL(5,2),
    date_recorded DATE
);

CREATE TABLE favorite_poses (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    pose_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(20),
    date_added DATE
);

CREATE TABLE favorite_sequences (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    sequence_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    poses_in_sequence JSONB,
    date_created DATE
);

CREATE TABLE session_logs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    duration INTERVAL,
    notes TEXT
);
